content: Why has President Obama not stepped forward to calm the waters between his number one supporter and the CIA? If Pelosi is innocent why hasn't she provided any documents to clear her? content: quote: Originally posted by Duster6: Why has President Obama not stepped forward to calm the waters between his number one supporter and the CIA? If Pelosi is innocent why hasn't she provided any documents to clear her? Could it be that the reason Obama has not made any public press releases is because deep down he wants her gone? After all, as of late she has not been providing him with any good press. If Pelosi is guilty, why haven't her detractors come up with proof? Remember, in this country, you're presumed innocent. But, to the subject of the thread: I'm not at all convinced that it's not just the Republican's after Nancy's hide. I think I see the deft hand of Hillary Clinton involved too. For instance, who's running the CIA now, the agency which is in a very public, and very unusual, tiff with the Speaker? That's right, a Clintonite. I guess I should put on my tin hat, but I'm not at all convinced that the Clinton's, and their supporters, aren't working overtime behind the scenes trying to torpedo Obama so Hillary can make a public break with him just in time to run again in 2012 under the banner of bringing the "change" Obama failed to deliver. "Their" guy in the Speakers chair would go a long way toward that goal.
